item.title: Asmodeus's Dread Authority
item.fluff: Asmodeus invests you with the authority he uses to rule the Nine Hells

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); The boon's level +5 vs. Will
Hit: The target is subject to your dread authority (save ends).
While subject to your authority, you can slide the target 1 square at the start of each of its turns.
Level 13: Slide 2 squares.
Level 23: Slide 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature subject to your dread authority, or one devil); The target chooses to either fall prone or take 5 fire damage. A devil does not benefit from resists against this damage.
Level 13: 10 fire damage.
Level 23: Ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends).

item.title: Avandra's Blessing of Confidence
item.fluff: Individuals blessed by Avandra gain an indomitable confidence in their own capabilities, allowing them to call upon teir inner stregnth to augment themselves

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► You gain resist 5 all against opportunity attacks.
Level 13: Resist 10 all.
Level 23: Resist 15 all.
► You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that render you dazed, dominated, immobilized, restrained, slowed, or stunned.

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Escape
item.fluff: Gambits that rely on luck draw boons from Avandra, and individuals blessed by her are impossible to corner

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You started your turn adjacent to two or more enemies
Effect: You shift 2 squares.
Level 13: Shift 3 squares.
Level 23: Shift 4 squares.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You teleport up to 2 squares.
Level 13: Up to 4 squares.
Level 23: Up to 6 squares.

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Storms
item.fluff: Like an ocean storm, change is both inevitable and rarely controllable, but to those who embrace change rather than fight it, Avandra occasionally grants the power to influence events

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks.
Level 11: +3 item bonus.
Level 21: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a skill check and don't like the result
Effect: You reroll the skill check and use the second result, even if it's lower.
Level 11: Use whichever result is higher.
Level 21: If the triggering skill check still fails, you regain the use of this power when you take a short rest.

item.title: Bahamut's Protective Ward
item.fluff: Bahamut grants his boon to heroes who shield the weak from the strong, and individuals who fight in Bahamut's name are beacons of hope and protection

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks.
Level 13: +2 item bonus.
Level 23: +3 item bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies provoke opportunity attacks from you if they make an attack that does not include you as a target.
Level 13: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.
Level 23: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.

item.title: Bane's Battle Acument
item.fluff: The Iron General is the consummate warrior and those with his favor gain a measure of his tactical acumen

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you roll a natural 19 or 20 on a Weapon attack roll, one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free action.
Level 13: The ally shifts up to 2 squares.
Level 23: One ally within 5 squares of you can shift up to 2 quares as a free reaction, or two allies within 5 squares of you can each shift 1 square as a free reaction.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You roll initiative
Effect: Close burst 5 (each ally in the burst); You slide each target 1 square.
Level 13: Slide up to 2 squares.
Level 23: Slide up to 3 squares.

item.title: Corellon's Boon of Arcane Might
item.fluff: Corellon brought arcane magic to the world, and mortals who please him gain access to powers that otherwise take years of study to master

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain one 1st-level at-will attack power from an arcane class as an encounter power.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Choose a 1st-level encounter power from the same arcane class this boon's property granted you a power. You can use the chosen power once before the end of the encounter.
Level 8: A 3rd-level or lower encounter power.
Level 13: A 7th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 18: A 13th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 23: A 17th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 28: A 23rd-level or lower encounter power.

item.title: Erathis' Beacon
item.fluff: The first cities were carved from the wilderness in the name of Erathis and, with her boon, the same sense of teamwork allows you and your allies to overcome any obstacle

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use the aid another or aid defense action, you grant your ally a +4 bonus rather than +2.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value. The target also gains a +1 bonus to his or her next attack roll.
Level 13: The target regains an additional 1d6 hit points, and gains a +2 bonus.
Level 23: The target regains an additional 2d6 hit points, and gains a +3 bonus.

item.title: Gruumsh's Bloodthirsty Wrath
item.fluff: Destruction and carnage are the only things able to quell Gruumsh's appetite for chaos

block.name: Property
block.line: The first time in an encounter that you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain temporary hit points equal to this boon's level.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be bloodied, or become bloodied by the triggering attack.
Trigger: An attack hits you.
Effect: You make a melee basic attack against a random creature within your reach. If this attack hits, you can also spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.
